segments.text: Bill , I must tell you the truth . You failed the English exam again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha . April Fool's ! Did you forget what day it is today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , you were pulling my leg all along . I was really fooled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , now let's be serious . Actually , you get high marks in the exam .
segments.speaker: S1
